c74object.name: hoa.syn.ringmod~
c74object.digest: A sound ring modulation field diffusion synthesizer.
c74object.description: hoa.syn.ringmod~ creates a diffuse sound field by modulating the amplitude of circular, spherical or plane waves signals depending on their number. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.
